plugins.name: Polygot
use: Disable languages with: let g:polyglot_disabled = ['css']

plugins.name: Minimalist
plugins.description: A material color scheme for darker vim.
use: In vimrc: colorscheme minimalist

plugins.name: Monokai Tasty
use: In vimrc: colorscheme vim-monokai-tasty

plugins.name: FZF
use: ctrl-p to open
ctrl-x horizontal split
ctrl-v vertical split
ctrl-t new tab

plugins.name: Lightline
plugins.description: A light and configurable statusline/tabline plugin for Vim
use: let g:lightline ={ 'colorscheme': 'wombat'}

plugins.name: Tagbar
plugins.description: Displays tags in a window, ordered by scope
use: ctrl-t to open
:T to open, if open jumps to window

plugins.name: Auto Pairs
plugins.description: Insert or delete brackets, parens, quotes in pair
use: Automatic when installed.

plugins.name: Surround
use: cs"' | "Hello World" changes to 'Hello World'
cs'<q> | 'Hello World' changes to <q>Hello World</q>
ds' 'Hello World' changes to Hello World

plugins.name: Repeat
plugins.description: Enable repeating supported plugin maps with '.'
use: Allows plugins like surround to work with . operator

plugins.name: Peekaboo
plugins.description: Extends " and @ in normal mode and <CTRL-R> in insert mode so you can see the coontents of the registers.
use: press " or @ for a sidebar to pop up, showing you the contents of your registers.
"add | delete and copy current line into register a.
"ap | paste contents of register a to current line

plugins.name: Easy Motion
use: shift-j in normal mode | shows characters for jumping below cursor.
shift-k in normal mode | show characters for jumping above cursor.

plugins.name: Matchit
plugins.description: Extends % matching for HTML, LaTeX, and many other languages.
use: allows % to jump from more robust set of tags

plugins.name: ZoomWin
plugins.description: Zoom in/out of windows (toggle between one window and multi-window)
use: <CTRL>-O zooms into current VIM pane or zoom out of it.
CAUTION: Some issues arise when TagBar is open.

plugins.name: Goyo
use: :G | toggle Goyo on or off.
let g:goyo_width=100

plugins.name: WindowSwap
plugins.description: Swap your windows without ruining your layout.
use: Go to pane to move, press <leader>ww, go to destination, press <leader>ww

extra_plugins.name: Ale Linter
extra_plugins.description: Asynchronous linting/fixing for Vim and Language Server Protocol (LSP) integration.
use: :ALEFix | Run through file and attempt to fix mistakes.
:ALEToggle | Turn ALE on or off for the file.
